column4: hi, when I click 'connect' in my ubuntu one folder, nothing happens, anyone have any suggestions?
i have the same problem with UbuntuOne right now -- i haven't upgraded, i'm still on my 9.04 - as it was working fine yesterday -- perhaps this is just a temporary problem with the servers?
I can log into the web interface fine, but the client wasnt working yesterday either. its disappointing Id like to give it a go
